p: A recent study summarized MERS-CoV infection in 11 pregnant women [ 98]. The gestational ages ranged from 6 weeks to 38 weeks. Among those 11 pregnant women, 7 (64%) were admitted to intensive care units and 3 (27%) died. Of the 11 births, 3 (27%) died, 2 had documented intrauterine death at 34 weeks and 5 months of gestation, and 1 was delivered at 24 weeks but did not survive.
